関連科目:
Economic History of the European Union、Introduction to European Economic History、
This class is an English version of "EU Keizai-ron" which will be held in the first half of the spring semester. Students who have already taken any credits of "EU Keizai-ron" are basically not allowed to take this class. If you are eager to take this class too, you have to contact SIS office and apply during the course registration period.
授業の概要・背景: The economic integration in the EU has given significant impacts on the world economy, and offers lessons which are also important in considering economic cooperation between Japan and Asian countries. Students will understand not only the EU but also future aspects of the Japanese economy.
授業方法:
The class is held in face to face format.
The class is held by the quarter system (the first half of the autumn semester), on 3rd and 4th slot of Thursday.
If you have any questions, please ask them actively during or after the lecture.
